randoop.reflection

Class OperationExtractor

  • Object
    • OperationExtractor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClassVisitor

    public class OperationExtractor
extends Object
implements ClassVisitor
    OperationExtractor is a ClassVisitor that creates a collection of Operation objects through its visit methods as called by ReflectionManager.apply(Class).
    See Also:
    ReflectionManager, ClassVisitor

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OperationExtractor()
      Creates a visitor object that collects Operation objects corresponding to class members visited by ReflectionManager.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OperationExtractor

        public OperationExtractor()
        Creates a visitor object that collects Operation objects corresponding to class members visited by ReflectionManager. Stores Operation objects in an ordered collection to ensure they are strictly ordered once flattened to a list. This is needed to guarantee determinism between Randoop runs with the same classes and parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • getOperations

        public List<Operation> getOperations()

      • getOperations

        public static List<Operation> getOperations(Collection<Class<?>> classListing,
                                            ReflectionPredicate predicate)
        Collects the members of a collection of classes. Returns a filtered list of Operation objects.
        Parameters:
        classListing - the collection of class objects from which to extract
        predicate - whether to include class members in results
        Returns:
        list of Operation objects satisfying the predicate
